comments.text:
I watched this drama with no expectations. I'm glad I did. It's such a 
sweet surprise. In my opinion, the guy is a perfect fit for Lee Gun. I 
didn't think he's too old for the role. I wouldn't believe a pretty boy 
next door or a younger looking guy being a ruthless businessman running a 
big company. ﻿

I like this OST, the beat cheer me up. Suitable for Kim Min Young' s 
personality which is cheerful ^ ^ I like Jang Nara so much . This drama 
makes me watching success story of bright girl, Midas, Thank you, Running 
Man (Jang Hyuk as guest star), Innocent Thing, Client, and I plan watching 
Chuno .... I have been infected JANG HYUK'S FEVER !!!!! This drama is 
PERFECT!! It gives sweet and pain story, it gives so many touching OST, and 
with veteran actor and actress as main lead with awesome acting skill and 
strongest chemistry, this drama become EXTRAORDINARY ^ ^ ﻿
